entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
